Key Match Events: Bangladesh lost to Pakistan by 5 wickets at the Adelaide Oval in the Super-12 stage of the tournament.
At the halfway stage Bangladesh were 70/1.
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan said his team could have done better after being eliminated from the T20 World Cup.
Shakib said this was the team's best performance in the T20 World Cup but they could've done better.
Shakib Al Hasan said he would like to carry on playing as long as he is fit and performing.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan have now joined India in the 2022 T20 World Cup semi-finals from Super-12 Group-2.
Bangladesh finished second from bottom in Group-2, with 4 points from 5 matches.
Others: Shakib Al Hasan felt that 145-`5- would have been a reasonable total on the Adelaide pitch.
